channel.title: Problems with servername! please help!
channel.description:
Hi, i've got a problem. 2 days ago i made a servername at no-ip.com and it worked perfectly. But that evening the server stops running and restarting the server didn't help. so yesterday i made another servername (also a no-ip one) and this one worked perfectly. But yesterday evening i had the same problem... Server just stops running and restarting won't help. So everytime (everyday so far) i've got to make another no-ip servername to let it work. The strange thing about this is when i delete the servername (at no-ip.com) and i make a new one with the same name,this one won't work...
What's the problem ? Can anyone help me ?
Thanks!
Senne
